metadata.description: Deletes the email of the user
metadata.name: Delete Email

props.children: If you are using this email to authenticate, you will not be able to login with it anymore.

metadata.description: Deletes the name of the user
metadata.name: Delete Name

props.children: Are you sure your want to delete your name?

metadata.description: Deletes the phone of the user
metadata.name: Delete Phone

props.children: If you are using this phone to authenticate, you will not be able to login with it anymore.

metadata.description: Resets the user password using their email address
metadata.name: Reset Password

props.children: We've sent a password reset link to {{sentTo.maskedEmail}}
Click the link in the email to continue
We will send you an email to reset your password.
You can now close this window and continue your password reset process

props.data-errormessage-type-mismatch: Value does not comply with requirements
props.name: newPassword
props.policy-label: Your password must have at least:

metadata.description: Sets the user's email; requires verification
metadata.name: Set Email

props.children: We've sent a verification link to {{sentTo.maskedEmail}}
Click the link in the email to continue
We've sent a message containing a 6-digit code to {{sentTo.maskedEmail}}
We’ll send a verification link to your new email.

metadata.description: Sets the user's phone; requires verification
metadata.name: Set Phone

props.children: We’ll send a verification code to your new phone.
We've sent a verification link to {{sentTo.maskedPhone}}
Click the link in the email to continue
You're authenticated, you can close this window now
We've sent a message containing a 6-digit code to {{sentTo.maskephone}}

metadata.description: Set the user's picture; allows uploading a new and removing existing
metadata.name: Set Picture

props.description: Click the button below to upload a picture
props.name: photo

metadata.description: Sets the user's passkeys; checks if device supports WebAuthn.
metadata.name: Set Passkeys

props.children: Unfortunately, your device doesn't support Passkeys (WebAuthn) recognition.
Passkeys (WebAuthn) recognition will make it easier for you to sign in! With passkeys you can use your fingerprint, face, or screen lock to verify it's really you.

metadata.description: The user’s main identifier in the system is their email address, and that’s also how they authenticate. With this widget, the user will be able to manage their email address and other personal information, as well as authentication methods.
metadata.name: Test Widget
